columns.text: Aliko Luxury Suites are ideal for couples seeking suites accommodation with sea view on the awe-inspiring Santorini Island, in Greece. Located on the most privileged spot of the island, in the scenic village of Imerovigli, at the highest point of the world-famous volcanic Caldera, they offer from all angles an alluring sea view of the Aegean Sea, a big part of Santorini, the neighbouring islands, and the stunning Caldera. Being the best choice for suites accommodation in Imerovigli, Aliko Luxury Suites guarantee an unforgettable romantic escape for couples. In a splendid exclusive setting, admiring the fascinating sea view, you will feel like the blessed inhabitants of a private paradise. Design is slick and minimal while staying true to the traditional style and not compromising on the extra touches that put these suites among the very best luxury accommodations on Santorini.

items.description: Aliko Suite is designed in tune with the traditional Cycladic architecture and offers all modern amenities and services.

items.seo_description: The Aliko Suite has a 70 sq.m elegant interior, a 35 sq.m terrace, an indoor jacuzzi, panoramic views of the sea and Caldera. Book this suite now!

items.title: Above Blue Suites
items.description: Above the endless Aegean blue, under the most majestic sunset and with a view of one of the planet’ s most energized volcano.Above Blue Suites represents a new concept of sanctuary where ten suites perched in the highest point of the stiff cliffs, facing the endless blue of the Aegean Sea, combine harmonically the unique architecture of the famous Santorinian caves, with the sophisticated luxury and the particular decoration, offering generously a truly romantic atmosphere.Suites are different in size and formation while an endless palette of coloring combinations offers to each one a unique personality and a singular style.Each suite offers stunning views to the Caldera, Thirassia, the volcano and the village of Oia. Hospitality reaches new heights at Santorini’s latest landmark; a top-notch cluster of uber elegant suites scattered on a steep rocky slope of the island’s famous Caldera, subtly linked with luring steps to form a delightful hamlet. The ten individually designed colour-coded suites, complemented by a secluded exclusive villa, are housed in some of the island’s immaculately restored signature caves and exude a feeling of intimacy, exclusive luxury and local allure, while ideally bridging the awe-inspiring sleeping volcano with romantic sunsets.
items.excerpt: Above Blue Suites represents a new concept of sanctuary where ten suites perched in the highest point of the stiff cliffs, facing the endless blue of the Aegean Sea, combine harmonically the unique architecture of the famous Santorinian caves, with the sophisticated luxury and the particular decoration, offering generously a truly romantic atmosphere.

amenities.item: All suites with magnificent view to the Aegean sea, volcano, sunset and village of Oia
Especially for honeymooners: room decoration with candles and rose petals, one bottle of champagne upon arrival
Champagne glasses on the first sunsets

items.title: White Harmony Suites Santorini
items.description: White Harmony Suites is a newly built boutique hotel with only 5 Suites, in the beautiful traditional village of Megalochori. IN A TRADITIONAL SETTLEMENT OF THE ISLAND, MEGALOCHORI, 4 BRAND NEW SUITES OFFER LUXURY AND COMFORTABLE ACCOMMODATION IN NATURE. They have been created with utmost respect to the environment, following the traditional Theran architecture with modern touches of supreme aesthetics. Bright colors are prevalent in decor, reflecting natural light bathing their interior. Two of them come with exterior Jacuzzi, while the rest have access to a private swimming pool. The luxurious amenities and the cordial services create the idyllic atmosphere and ensure the optimal holiday experience for you. White Harmony Suites is the ultimate destination of relaxation in santorini. Let us introduce you to unpretentious luxury’ splendidly combined with the island’s natural beauty and its unique character.

SEO.title: Aliko Luxury Suites | Aqua Vista Hotels
SEO.description: Aqua Vista Hotel's Aliko Luxury Suites are 2 ultra luxury villas in the picturesque village of Imerovigli, Santorini. Privacy & unsurpassed views await you!
